title: rAma rAma guNa kusumA
sahitya:
rAma rAma guNa kusuma rAma ramaNiyakabhirAma


anupallavi

  dIna pAlana nirajita parashurAma ramAbimbOkAlaya


caraNam 1    rAjarAja vandya caraNambhOja bhO jagatrayaAdhara rAjarAja 
manyEshu cApa vikrama bhAsurArAja rAja santAna dIpa
    caraNam 2    tAratarA suta krtOpacAra cAra vidita lOkacAra 
caraNa sEvitavidaLita bhU bhAra bhAratIsha bhAvita
    caraNam 3    kAla kAlAdhrta sItAmahEla hElashraya vishikavAtulAyita 
dUSaNa sujana vihAra sAla sAla vigata dUSaNa
    caraNam 4    lOkAlOka tIta guNa vipAka pAka hita pUjita lOkAlOka 
muni mAnita parihrta bhava shOka vana hrtasita
    caraNam 5    bhAnu bhAnusama tEjO bhujAnujAnu kula pLavagAnuganu 
shrta sugrIva kausalyA nandanA-nUnAnupama vaibhava
